ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.VRBatchSetting__c.IsBatchExecution__c), ISPICKVAL( Case_Type__c,"Pickup"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Asset.Product2.Equipment_Type__c,"Baler")), NOT( $User.Bypass_Validation__c ),ISPICKVAL( Asset.Product2.Family , "Rolloff"),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c,"Empty and Return")),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c,"Empty and Do NOT Return")),NOT(ISBLANK(Text( Case_Sub_Type__c )) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Asset's product family is Rolloff, you may only select "Empty and Return" or "Empty and Do NOT Return". Please re- select subtype.
